name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior PHP Engineer with over 8 years of experience in full-stack development, specializing in building secure and performant web solutions. Proficient in **PHP**, **RESTful APIs**, and design patterns, with a strong foundation in Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), SOLID principles, and Clean Code methodologies.  Adept at implementing secure coding practices and web security measures that ensure compliance.

Skilled in enhancing web infrastructure and leveraging **Docker** for containerization, I have a proven track record in collaborating with teams to foster a culture of mentorship and continuous improvement. My problem-solving abilities, coupled with effective communication skills, enable me to deliver high-quality software solutions while mentoring junior developers. Furthermore, I possess substantial experience in integrating modern technologies such as **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Python**, with machine learning components, fostering innovation in the healthcare and financial sectors.
